abstract: Instead of only sponsoring the biggest names in sports, Citigroup is choosing to help rookies and amateurs, who may — or may not — be right on the cusp of hitting it big.
snippet: Instead of only sponsoring the biggest names in sports, Citigroup is choosing to help rookies and amateurs, who may — or may not — be right on the cusp of hitting it big.
lead_paragraph: FINANCIAL services companies have long sought to associate themselves with athletes who represent the best of their profession. Think of Yao Ming and Visa, or Tiger Woods and American Express.

headline.main: Citi’s Sports Marketing Strategy Turns Its Focus to Stars-to-Be
headline.print_headline: Citi’s Sports Marketing Strategy Turns Its Focus to Stars-to-Be
